definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: ford, rare synon. of [[מַעֲבָר]] [[מַעְבָּרָה]];—abs. ´[[הָע]] 2Sa 19:19 and they crossed the ford (v. [[עבר]]

definitions.title: Qal 1 a
definitions.body: ); pl. cstr. [[עַברוֹת הַמִּדְבָּר]] 2Sa 15:28 Kt (Qr [[עַרְבוֹת]]), so 2Sa 17:16 van d. H. (but Baer Ginsb [[עַרְבוֹת]] Kt also), ´[[עַב]] preferable (so Th We Dr Bu Kit Löhr HPS), the fords of the desert (HPS 2Sa 17:16 n. pr.).
